name: Battle for the Moon!
description:
A game for the 2020 Game off Game jam. It's a space game with intermixed story about greed, intrigue, the bonds of family, and love.

But really it's a kind of fun game that is mostly hot trash. mouse buttons control attacks (or trigger and x button on Xbox controller). You can pause with escape, skip dialogues with Enter. I had a good time building this, but it was my first game so you know don't expect miracles, there are four levels and a fun bonus scene at the end.

If you liked or didn't like it or want some source code or are just interested in how something worked feel free to drop a comment.
